attributes.action: Prevent future deaths on Boneham's Lane and Ullesthorpe Road junction
attributes.additional_details:
For the full story and more information please click the link below.

http://10000signaturesneeded.blogspot.co.uk/2016/12/special-k.html
attributes.background: On the 15th of May 2015 Kian Gill aged 15 was hit off his bike by a car at this junction, that was the day our Special K got taken away from us. The problem is that nothing that was said in the incident report to prevent future deaths from happening has been done and its about time things change.

rejection.details:
We were very sorry to read about Kian's death; please accept our condolences.

However, we can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
